data.title: Yoshi's Island
data.description: A small island where the Yoshis live. Your boss is Iggy Koopa.

tasks.title: Amazing Flyin
tasks.description: Throws hammers standing on top of flying blocks.

tasks.title: Rex
tasks.description: This dinosaur is one of the first enemies in the game. It is only defeated by jumping twice on its head.

data.title: Valley Of Bowser
data.description: World located in a valley inside a huge cave that is shaped like Bowser's head. Their bosses are Larry Koopa and Bowser himself.

tasks.title: Morton Koopa Jr
tasks.description: Climbs walls of his room and lands on Mario and the jump makes earthquakes, is the second of the Koopalings.

tasks.title: Wendy O. Koopa
tasks.description: She uses the same attack as Lemmy, but there are two podoboos in her room, and she is the sixth of the Koopalings.
